info.name: ENTI_Pixelation
info.description: Change the define values in order to see how it afects to the pixelation effect.

renderpass.code:
#define PIXELATION //Comment this to disable pixelation
#define pixelWidth 30. //Define width of pixel
#define pixelHeight 60. //Define height of pixel

void mainImage( out vec4 fragColor, in vec2 fragCoord ) {
    
     vec2 uv = fragCoord/iResolution.xy; //Define UVs
    
     vec4 color_ = texture(iChannel0, uv); //Define color
    
     fragColor = color_; //Result without pixelation
    
#ifdef PIXELATION
    
    vec2 pixelSize = vec2(pixelWidth, pixelHeight); //Define pixel size with width and height global variables
     
    vec2 pixelCOORDS = vec2(iResolution.xy / pixelSize); //Distribute pixels on screen (resolution)
    
    vec2 pixeledUV = floor(uv * pixelCOORDS) / pixelCOORDS; //Define pixeled UV's
    
    vec4 color = texture(iChannel0, pixeledUV); //Calculate new image color/texture

    fragColor = color; //Result with pixelation
    
#endif
    
}
renderpass.name: Image
